subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: A. J. Allmendinger lost his ride at Red Bull Racing, paving the way for the former Formula One driver Scott Speed to replace him next season. Allmendinger was in his second season driving the No. 84 Toyota, but Red Bull said it would not renew his contract for 2009.
